sentences.en: a book on the criminal justice system
sentences.cn: 一本有关刑事审判制度的书

sentences.en: Acts of terrorism must not escape justice.
sentences.cn: 恐怖主义行为必定难逃法律制裁。

sentences.en: Children have a strong sense of justice.
sentences.cn: 儿童有很强的正义感。

sentences.en: He promised to allow justice to run its course unimpeded.
sentences.cn: 他承诺要让司法正义不受阻碍地得到伸张。

sentences.en: He said that the decision flew in the face of natural justice.
sentences.cn: 他说这个决定有悖天理。

sentences.en: He was a tireless worker for justice.
sentences.cn: 他是个为了正义不知疲倦地工作的人。

sentences.en: He was charged with conspiring to pervert the course of justice.
sentences.cn: 他被控谋划妨碍司法公正。

sentences.en: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

sentences.en: His people came to him demanding justice.
sentences.cn: 他的手下来找他，寻求公正。

sentences.en: I don't think he could do himself justice playing for England.
sentences.cn: 我认为他为英格兰队效力时不可能充分发挥自己的水平。

sentences.en: I say this in justice to both of you.
sentences.cn: 为了对你们两人公平起见，我说了这些话。

sentences.en: I too am committing myself to continue the fight for justice.
sentences.cn: 我本人也保证将继续为正义而战。

sentences.en: My sense of justice was offended.
sentences.cn: 我的正义感被激了起来。

sentences.en: No one doubts the justice of our cause.
sentences.cn: 没有人怀疑我们的事业是正义的。

sentences.en: She'd need proof to bring Jason to justice.
sentences.cn: 她需要有证据才能将贾森绳之以法。

sentences.en: the brief menu does not &B{do justice to} the food.
sentences.cn: 这份简短的菜单没有充分说明食物的特色。

sentences.en: The killers will be brought to justice(= caught and punished ).
sentences.cn: 这些杀人犯将被绳之以法。

sentences.en: The past has been scarred by countless mistrials and perversions of justice.
sentences.cn: 过去数不清的冤假错案和枉法行为给人们带来了创伤。

sentences.en: The past has been scarred by countless perversions of justice.
sentences.cn: 无数的是非颠倒使过去的岁月伤痕累累。

sentences.en: The perpetrators of this evil deed must be brought to justice.
sentences.cn: 必须将参与这一恶行的凶手绳之以法。

sentences.en: The rebel leader was a fugitive from justice.
sentences.cn: 叛军头目是一名在逃的不法之徒。

sentences.en: The subject is so complex that I cannot do justice to it in a brief survey.
sentences.cn: 这个主题太复杂，我无法只通过简略的研究就对它做出公正的评价

sentences.en: They demanded that those responsible be brought to justice.
sentences.cn: 他们要求将责任人缉拿归案。

sentences.en: Trial by television makes for very rough justice indeed.
sentences.cn: 电视庭审实际上会令审判不公。
